message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer for your business, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you, and I'm confident you'll see the value it brings to your operations.

I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me, and I'm confident we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I was hoping to get closer to the product's true value to you. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $975000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits the product will bring to your business.

I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $925000 for the product. I believe this is a reasonable price considering its worth to me, and I'm willing to compromise to reach an agreement.
